meanings.definition: The state of being close to another person or people.
meanings.sent1: Family dinners bring a sense of togethernesses.
meanings.sent2: The togethernesses of the team helped them win the game.
meanings.sent3: The togethernesses at the picnic made everyone feel warm and happy.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, the community's togethernesses shines brightest.
meanings.sent5: The togethernesses of friends can make any day brighter.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being united with others in a group.
meanings.sent1: The togethernesses of the choir members created beautiful music.
meanings.sent2: Volunteering together fosters a sense of togethernesses.
meanings.sent3: The togethernesses of the class during the project was inspiring.
meanings.sent4: The togethernesses of the fans at the concert was electric.
meanings.sent5: The togethernesses of the team made them unstoppable.

meanings.definition: The quality of being in harmony or agreement with others.
meanings.sent1: The togethernesses of the band members made their performance flawless.
meanings.sent2: The togethernesses of the community led to successful town meetings.
meanings.sent3: The togethernesses of the siblings surprised their parents.
meanings.sent4: The togethernesses of the group was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The togethernesses of the team was evident in their synchronized movements.
